BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection

Items.Title: Oversight - Student Debt as a Barriers to Generational Wealth.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Student Debt as a Barriers to Generational Wealth.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code, in relation to requiring the department of consumer and worker protection to report on public use of the department’s financial empowerment centers and student debt distress in the city
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dept of consumer and worker protection to report on public use of the department’s financial empowerment centers and student debt distress in the city.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to banning companies that charge a fee for “student debt relief” already provided by the federal government and creating a private cause of action for borrowers who fall victim to these scams
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Banning companies that charge a fee for “student debt relief” already provided by the federal government.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Kagan, Velázquez, Bottcher, Brewer, Krishnan and Ossé

Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
